General.Name: Crew Energy Inc
General.Description: Crew Energy Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and production of crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids (NGL) in Canada. Its principal properties include Montney oil and liquids-rich natural gas assets comprising Septimus, West Septimus, Groundbirch, and Tower in northeast British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 250-5th Street SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0R4
